name: The Circles - Perfect Path to Connect Flood Colors
name_original: The Circles - Perfect Path to Connect Flood Colors
description:
-----New Enhanced Update-----
Unlimited with randomly generated levels
Very Easy to use and play
Nice Flat Design


The Circles
Easy simple puzzle game

Climb the leaderboard by connecting and match same colors , need 3 Circles same color.
Sounds easy right!?
But make sure to take your time to match, little bit challenging

Unlock all the rewards to become a Circle Master! Challenge your friends and post your scores!

Use Power Ups to help you get more points! And More Time, More Moves, or choose to re-arrange the board by using Shrink and Extend to maximize score

--------------------------------INCLUDS---------------------------------
- Endless Levels
- 25+ Awards
- 3 Game Modes
- 4 and more powerups

Share your Score With
Unlock rewards
Challenges

Thank you for your feedback to enhance the app
support : info@simpleapps.ca
